sentences.en: ...the one-hour westward flight over the Andes to Lima.
sentences.cn: …越过安第斯山脉到利马一小时的向西飞行。

sentences.en: A westward moving airstream will, therefore, move equatorwards as it passes over the barrier.
sentences.cn: 因此,向西流动的气流在通过壁垒时, 将向赤道方向运动.
向西或到什么别的地方去勘探.

sentences.en: General Macarthur was working westward along the north coast of New Guinea.
sentences.cn: 麦克阿瑟将军正在沿着新几内亚北岸向西进军.

sentences.en: He sailed westward from Palos de la Frontera.
sentences.cn: 他从帕洛斯-德拉弗龙特拉向西航行。

sentences.en: Once out in the street , he walked westward.
People came westward in the 1800s to pan for gold.
sentences.cn: 在19世纪，人们前往西部淘金。

sentences.en: The belt is a westward - opening crescent.
sentences.cn: 成矿带呈西端张开的新月状.

sentences.en: The family left Washington , typically without fuss, returning " westward and home ".
sentences.cn: 这一家人毫不张扬地 “ 回西部老家去 ”.

sentences.en: The idea of going westward to China was therefore a fairly obvious one.
sentences.cn: 所以,向西到达中国的想法相当明确.

sentences.en: The road ranges westward from the lake.
sentences.cn: 这条路由湖边向西延伸.

sentences.en: The ship turned westward, away from the coast.
sentences.cn: 船调转方向离开海岸，向西驶去。

sentences.en: The westward flow of population would have been far more sluggish.
sentences.cn: 否则人口的向西迁移也将缓慢得多.

sentences.en: They turned westward / westwards after crossing the river.
sentences.cn: 他们过河以后向西拐了.

sentences.en: We live on the westward slope of the hill.
sentences.cn: 我们住在这座山的西山坡.

sentences.en: Within hours, she was free to resume her journey westward.
sentences.cn: 几小时以后她便抽出身来重新开始西行的旅程。

words.tran_cn: 西方的，西部的；有西方特征的
西方人；西部片，西部小说
西方人，欧美人；美国西部的人
